description: Try our easy to follow Greek Salad With Baked Feta & Pita Crisps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Greek Salad With Baked Feta & Pita Crisps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 continental cucumber, halved lengthways, deseeded, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Brush wraps with some of the oil and sprinkle with paprika. Cut into wedges or roughly tear. Lay onto baking tray. Bake for 10 minutes until crisp and golden.

Pat feta dry with paper towel. Place half the thyme into a small ovenproof dish, top with feta, remaining thyme, chilli, if using, and garlic. Drizzle with 1 tbs of oil. Cover with foil and bake for 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, toss the rest of the oil with the remaining ingredients for the salad together in a bowl. Preheat the grill. Remove foil from feta and grill for a few minutes until golden. Serve feta with salad and pita crisps.
